description: Source code file implementing WiFi frame testing and parsing functions, including socket communication, frame parsing, and PCAP file processing.

methods.name: bool is_matching_cmd_in_list(wifi_test_command_id_t matching_cmd,frame_test_arg_t * arg)
methods.description: Checks if a given command ID matches any command in a provided list within frame test arguments.

methods.name: int wifi_send_test_frame(unsigned char * frame,size_t frame_len,frame_test_arg_t * arg,wifi_test_command_id_t cmd,wifi_direction_t dir)
methods.description: Constructs and sends a test WiFi frame over UDP socket to localhost for testing purposes.

methods.name: int parse_data_frame(struct ieee80211_frame * frame,size_t frame_len,frame_test_arg_t * arg,wifi_direction_t dir)
methods.description: Parses data frames, checks for LLC headers, and sends frames for testing if conditions are met.

methods.name: int parse_mgmt_frame(struct ieee80211_frame * frame,size_t len,frame_test_arg_t * arg,wifi_direction_t dir)
methods.description: Parses management frames based on subtype and triggers test frame sending accordingly.

methods.name: int parse_ctl_frame(struct ieee80211_frame * frame,size_t len,frame_test_arg_t * arg,wifi_direction_t dir)
methods.description: Placeholder function that currently returns an error; intended for control frame parsing.

methods.name: int get_mac_address(char * intf_name,mac_address_t mac)
methods.description: Retrieves MAC address of a specified network interface on Linux systems.

methods.name: int parse_frame(unsigned char * data,size_t len,frame_test_arg_t * arg,wifi_direction_t * frame_dir)
methods.description: Main frame parser that handles radiotap headers, distinguishes frame types, and parses appropriately.

methods.name: bool is_ng_file(char * file_name)
methods.description: Checks if the provided filename is a pcapng file.

methods.name: int test_data_from_pcap(frame_test_arg_t * arg)
methods.description: Reads and processes pcap files to extract WiFi frames and parse them.

methods.name: int test_data_from_pcapng(frame_test_arg_t * arg)
methods.description: Reads and processes pcapng files to extract WiFi frames and parse them.

methods.name: int get_test_data(frame_test_arg_t * arg)
methods.description: Selects the appropriate file parser based on file extension and processes test data.

methods.name: int test_mgmt_frame_rx(unsigned int ap_index,mac_address_t sta_mac,const char * proto)
methods.description: Simulates reception of management frames with predefined payloads for testing.

ctags.pattern: /^int wifi_send_test_frame(unsigned char *frame, size_t frame_len, frame_test_arg_t *arg, wifi_tes/
